name: Amethyst Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Someone can trade 4,000 trust points for this necklace with Tik'hi Tak'he in Rascacoon.

name: Amulet of Loss

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Prevents item loss caused by dying, but breaks upon dying. Since update 8.41 buying all blessings gives the same functionality as wearing the Amulet of Loss. However, Amulet of Loss does not protect against experience and skill loss, which full blessings do. If you die in PVP with the Twist of Fate blessing and wearing an Amulet of Loss, you will only lose Twist of Fate.
It does not work on Red Skulled and Black Skulled players. In this case it breaks and is not lootable.
Premium players can sell them to Free Account players who can not get all five blessings, for a higher price, because only Eremo sells them. They can be bought and looted on Hardcore PvP game worlds since Update 8.53.
This amulet replaced the Amulet of Life, which would shield both skills and items from loss.
It was also possible to obtain in a Red Surprise Bag during Tibia's 10th Anniversary and Tibia's 15th Anniversary celebrations.

name: Amulet of Theurgy

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Depleted version of the Enchanted Theurgic Amulet. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

name: Ancient Amulet (Quest)

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Some fine artisanship right there.
Part of the Krailos Quest.

name: Ancient Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Only used as decoration. Can be seen in Omrucs pharaoh room in Ankrahmun.

name: Beetle Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It increases your speed by 4 points (2 levels).

For other items that grant speed bonuses, see: Speed Set.

name: Bonfire Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This is believed to be an Unobtainable Item.

name: Broken Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This was the old Amulet of Life before the Update 7.2. It has no practical purpose and can be sold back to Eremo. But it is advised to not do this! Since it is a discontinued item and extremely valuable when sold to other players. Alternatively, due to its rarity it is an impressive item to own. Therefore, great for collectors.

name: Bronze Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces mana drain by up to 20%. It has 200 charges. Considered rare and valuable in Rookgaard. Very useful when fighting monsters that drain mana, as it is almost surely to make up for its cost. Some monsters that can deal a lot of mana drain damage are: all kinds of Bonelords, Demons, Dwarf Geomancers, Hands of Cursed Fate, Spectres, Dipthrah, Priestesses, Warlocks.
One can be obtained in the Power Ring Quest.

name: Bronze Medal

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesContest Prizes

notes:
Notes
Probably a future contest prize.
You can only read the text if you stand at two squares from it or closer.

name: Bronze Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
In former times it was a one time spawn at the Venore swamp.

name: Candy Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Collar of Blue Plasma

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Similar to rings, and different from most amulets, this collar can  be equipped/unequipped in smart mode using an action button of the action bars. It can be sold for the full price to the NPC even if used, as long as it does not disappear when used completely. Can also look like:

name: Collar of Green Plasma

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Increases your Mana and Hitpoints Regeneration for 30 minutes by the rate of 2 HP and 8 MP per 6 seconds, which means it recover 2400 MP and 600 HP in total. Similar to rings, and different from most amulets, this collar can  be equipped/unequipped in smart mode using an action button of the action bars. It can be sold for the full price to the NPC even if used, as long as it does not disappear when used completely. Can also look like:

name: Collar of Red Plasma

attributes.Attributes: sword fighting +4, club fighting +4, axe fighting +4
attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Similar to rings, and different from most amulets, this collar can  be equipped/unequipped in smart mode using an action button of the action bars. It can be sold for the full price to the NPC even if used, as long as it does not disappear when used completely. Can also look like:

name: Crystal Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Only used as a decoration amulet, often neglected by most players until Rashid started buying them after Winter Update 2008 and its loot value increased dramatically.

Can be obtained in the Skull of Ratha Quest.

name: Demonbone Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Just for decoration, no actual use yet. Part of the Bone Set.
It looks the same as the V-Belt.

name: Diamond Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Someone can trade 10,000 trust points for this necklace with Tik'hi Tak'he in Rascacoon.

name: Dragon Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces Fire damage by 8%, the damage reduction is rounded up to the nearest whole number.
It looks the same as Jerom's Family Necklace.
You can get a Dragon Necklace in Life Ring Quest and Fire Axe Quest.

name: Elven Amulet

attributes.Resists: physical +5%, fire +5%, earth +5%, energy +5%, ice +5%, holy +5%, death +5%
attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces fire, earth, ice, energy, death, holy and physical damage by exactly 5%, rounded up to the next whole number. This amulet is good to wear in environments where you receive several different types of damage.
Obtainable in Deeper Fibula Quest, Time Ring Quest and To Blind the Enemy Quest.

name: Emerald Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Someone can trade 4,000 trust points for this necklace with Tik'hi Tak'he in Rascacoon.

name: Enchanted Pendulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It will discharge after wearing it for 2 hours. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

name: Enchanted Sleep Shawl

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It will discharge after wearing it for 1 hour. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

name: Enchanted Theurgic Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It will discharge after wearing it for 2 hours. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

attributes.Attributes: sword fighting +3, club fighting +3, axe fighting +3
attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:

It will discharge after wearing it for 2 hours. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens. It's part of the Naga Set.

name: Enchanted Werewolf Amulet

attributes.Classification: Body EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesLight Sources

notes:
Notes
This is a Werewolf Amulet which is enchanted with Moonlight Crystals. Timer will only run while this item is equipped.
It lasts 60 minutes.

name: Exotic Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Ferumbras' Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Using this amulet can give you 1000 Hit Points or 1000 Mana Points (by random chance). It has a 1 hour cooldown. This means the Ferumbras' Amulet used can not be used by another player for an hour, and you can not use a different Ferumbras' Amulet for an hour. 
Note: for the amulet to recharge you have to be online and have the amulet either equipped or in your backpack, you can also leave it at a House

name: Foxtail Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reward of the Grimvale Quest - The Curse Spreads.

name: Friendship Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesFansite Items

notes:
Notes
This item can only be obtained by buying from players as TibiaFriends has closed. If you use this item you can hear sounds.
Its replica is the Friendship Amulet (Replica).
It was created by Sir Ruffuzz, who received the first Friendship Amulet. This item was first awarded in a Halloween Party on Luminera by Nefen Strongmage Luminera.
Pilux, Annya Anger, Jawor Paank, Anara Shadowdark and Redax all won a Friendship Amulet in the contest "Pimp your profile" hosted by TibiaFriends in 2009.
Other receivers of this item include:

Beyolina won a Friendship Amulet for her contribution to the Truth Odyssey Art Competition hosted by TibiaFriends in 2010.
Players placed 3rd in the "My Tibia Story" contest, in May, 2010:
Natakat
Geek Luveh
Karlkoninan won a Friendship Amulet for winning TibiaFriends' contest "Best Decorated House in Tibia".
Bigx was awarded with this amulet for winning second place in lottery of TibiaFriends.
Paula Ines recieved one in 2010 for winning 1st place in the Christmas Card Competition.
Loth Jose recieved one in 2010 for winning 2nd Place in the Christmas Card Competition.
"Royal Painting Contest", hosted by Tibia.com and supported by TibiaFriends:
Shallie received one for Carlin;
Pshyco Druid received one for Thais.
Ardilla Selassie won a Friendship Amulet each for the Pick the CM's Statement Contest hosted by TibiaFriends.
Voyant won a Friendship Amulet for participating in programming contest hosted by TibiaFriends.

name: Garlic Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces Life Drain by 20%. A useful item to significantly reduce life drain attacks such as the Frost Dragons smoke wave and Demons life drain beam, among others.
Especially useful while hunting cults, since most of the damage you take comes from Life Drain.
Item obtained in Ghoul Room Quest, Ornamented Shield Quest, Triangle Tower Quest, Troll Cave Quest, and The Rookie Guard Quest.
Three of these are needed to weaken The Count, and one is needed in Blood Brothers Quest.

name: Garnet Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Someone can trade 4,000 trust points for this necklace with Tik'hi Tak'he in Rascacoon.

name: Gearwheel Chain

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Supersedes the Platinum Amulet for players who meet the level requirement.  An Enchanted Werewolf Amulet has no level requirement and provides more physical protection where Moonlight Crystals are available.  Higher level players can also consider a Foxtail Amulet.

name: Gill Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
The resistances and charges on this item make it very attractive, but one major drawback is the prevalence of poisoning monsters - poison damage will be blocked, wasting charges. The other necklace, Prismatic Necklace, has physical/energy resistance instead and may be an alternative purely for the physical resistance. Still, it is a useful necklace and quite affordable with the popularity of warzones (mostly on optional PvP servers).Can be obtained as reward of the  Bigfoot's Burden Quest in Warzone 1.

name: Glacier Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It gives 20% Ice Protection, but increases damage taken from Energy by 10%.Part of the Glacier Set.

name: Glooth Amulet

attributes.Resists: physical +10%, fire +10%, earth +10%, energy +10%, ice +10%, holy +10%, death +10%
attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Similar to an Elven Amulet or a Might Ring. Can be obtained by using a Glooth Bag.

name: Glowing Rubbish Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This is the charged version of a Rubbish Amulet.
It will expire 5 minutes after being looted.
It's necessary during the Cults of Tibia Quest - Misguided

name: Gold Medal

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesContest Prizes

Notes
It can be seen on Adventurer's Guild Treasure Room under a Jewel Case. Probably a future contest prize. It is believed to be an Unobtainable Item.
You can only read the text if you stand at two squares from it or closer.

name: Golden Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Only used as decoration. Can be seen in Omrucs pharaoh room in Ankrahmun and upstairs in the Venore Bank.

name: Golden Hyaena Pendant

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
A golden hyena pendant on a table is depicted in an artwork for September 2017's Featured Article.
 See also: Golden Scorpion Pendant

name: Golden Scorpion Pendant

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It is believed to be an Unobtainable Item.

name: Jade Amulet (Replica)

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesValuablesReplicas

notes:
Notes
This item is a replica of Jade Amulet.

name: Jade Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesFansite Items

notes:
Notes
You can only read the text if you stand at two squares from it or closer.
It's TibiaHof fansite item.
Its replica is the Jade Amulet (Replica).

name: Jerom's Family Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesQuest Items

notes:
Notes
Looks the same as a Dragon Necklace.

Temporarily obtained in the Troll Sabotage Quest.

name: Koshei's Ancient Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesQuest Items

notes:
Notes
It's said that it once belonged to Koshei the Deathless, the curious. Provides 2 squares of weak green light. Mostly keept as a valuable death protection necklace, as it has no limited amount of charges.
Part of Koshei the Deathless Quest. After delivering four broken amulet pieces to A Sweaty Cyclops, you can collect this amulet from him after a 24-hour (real-time) wait. You must use it on Koshei's dead body in order to defeat him, but you can also just sell it for the same price as or sometimes even higher than the Blue Legs, the reward of the quest, to other players.

name: Leviathan's Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Can be obtained by fishing in a fresh corpse of a Water Elemental or a Massive Water Elemental. See also: Water Elemental/Fishing Statistics and Massive Water Elemental/Fishing Statistics

name: Lightning Pendant

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Part of the Lightning set. You can use them if looted while hunting wyrms until they have few charges because even then you can still sell them to Rashid. You have to be careful because earth damage also drains charges of it, so if you are poisoned you can run out of charges very fast.

name: Lion Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Lucky Clover Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesFansite Items

notes:
Notes
This item was originally created by Charlie Root and can only be obtained by winning a contest sponsored by or a contest made by the supported fansite TibiaLottery.
Its replica is the Lucky Clover Amulet (Replica).
This item can be seen on Secura in the house of Delixu, who received it as a gift from Shane who likes Cake, the administrator and creator of Tibia Lottery. A copy of this item was given away in a 2010 competition, this was won by  on the world of Eternia. This amulet is now on olympa and the owner is Zerainbow its the same amulet that was won on Eternia.
It was won by Celaya during the TibiaLottery's "Kill Somebody or Die Trying, 2nd Edition" competition. Muhamed Marley won this item in Tibia Movie Awards 2010..
Nyste also won this item through a lottery organised by Tibia Lottery in 2010, and the amulet can be seen in his house on the world of Refugia.
Freedom Angel also won it in "Kill Somebody or Die Trying" competition. But He sold it for 4.000.000 gold to Fusawashii
Lokirj (TibiaBR Administrator) has this amulet. It is unknown how he got it.
Sir Panax & Lady Panaxx has one also.
Honken also has one. He bought it from Zerainbow. You can see it in his house, in Olympa.
Shallie got one as present from her cousin Malldor, who won 1st place on "Royal Painting Contest".
Lundy won as an extra reward in the Tibia-Stats Riddle Contest Lottery for taking 42th place in it.
Quickske and Decadrio Hawke won the amulet in a Christmas Lottery from TibiaLottery. They sold it for 25.000.000 gold.

name: Magma Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
A previously unobtainable item, After Summer update 2012 it became lootable from a variety of monsters making it a common item.

name: Necklace of the Deep

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Consider using this item in any situation when you can not avoid strong beams dealing Life Drain damage, like during The Annihilator Quest or if being trapped by Frazzlemaws and Guzzlemaws.

name: Note About Two Souls

attributes.Classification: Body EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesQuest Items

notes:
Notes
This item can be obtained by using The Cobra Amulet on an Intricate Cobra Shrine located inside a hidden crypt north of Ankrahmun. The crypt can be accessed by using a Shovel here. When this item was released, its creator Lionet explained what's behind its story:

I really appreciate the interest of the Tibia Community in our lore and stories! Here are some additional notes on my story of Scarlett and Galthen:
The Cobra amulet is an extremely powerful artifact with an unknown origin as of now. Its traits are concentrated on a single individual but the curse will affect all things directly connected to the amulet and its wearer. When the amulet is returned to its eternal resting place, everything the taker, thus owner, of the amulet has experienced from that point in time onward will be undone. All of this, as already mentioned, will only affect events in direct relation to the bearer of the amulet and the bearer him- or herself.
In the case of Scarlett and Galthen, Scarlett was blinded towards Galthen while in turn a successful search for Scarlett was impeded by the amulet. Returning it to its resting place will alter the timeline for Scarlett (and also Galthen who is directly connected to the Scarlett, the amulet and ultimately the curse). So in their world, the events after the crypt never took place. Everything before that will still have happened. However, without the power of the Cobra, Scarlett will not continue the assassin path much further and she, as well as Galthen, will have the possibility to find each other. Both their searches would eventually be successful as they belong together.
By chosing to return the amulet, players are effectively building a somewhat happy ending for the two but will lose the amulet. That is why the note says: "You are truly selfless".

name: Onyx Pendant

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reward from the Krailos Quest.

name: Ornamented Brooch

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Shows which blessings you have received, like a Ceremonial Ankh. Fluctuates in value.

name: Paw Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This item can be seen in upper floor of Tibian Explorer Society in Port Hope, in Morguthis Room and on Island of Destiny in the druids area. It is most likely not yet obtainable in game. Probably just a decoration piece with no magical powers. It has what appears to be an ape's paw on it. Its data can be seen in the Market.Paw Amulet

name: Pendulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

name: Platinum Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It provides +2 armor, making it much better than a Scarf (though a Scarf is cheaper for lower leveled players).  After update 8.41, the Amulet of Loss became nearly useless, making this item favored by players of all vocations.
After the update of 10.5 the Platinum Amulet was replaced by the Gearwheel Chain as the best neck armor in the game for players above level 75.

Reward in Behemoth Quest.

name: Prismatic Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reward from the Warzone 2 chest of the Bigfoot's Burden Quest.

name: Protection Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces Physical Damage by exactly 6%, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

name: Rainbow Amulet

attributes.Classification: Body EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This item can be seen on the Cyclopedia. It was implemented at the same update that Rainbow Necklace had its stats changed and became obtainable. The stats of both amulets were identical during the first days of the test server. Moreover, the description of the rainbow amulet used to be "DO NOT USE". Someone might infer from this that this item was a duplicate of the Rainbow Necklace and, when the developers noticed it, they doomed it be an Unobtainable Item.

name: Rainbow Necklace

attributes.Classification: Body EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Rhodolith Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Someone can trade 4,000 trust points for this necklace with Tik'hi Tak'he in Rascacoon.

name: Rubbish Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It looks like a Silver Amulet with a Piece of Iron on it.
It becomes a Glowing Rubbish Amulet for 5 minutes once it is charged.
It will expire 60 minutes after being looted. 
It's necessary during the Cults of Tibia Quest - Misguided

name: Ruby Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Only used as decoration.

name: Sacred Tree Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

Notes
This object has no notes.

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It was an Unobtainable Item for many years till it was dropped by Lady Tenebris. A sapphire amulet can be seen in the Darashia Catacombs Treasure Room.

name: Sapphire Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Someone can trade 4,000 trust points for this necklace with Tik'hi Tak'he in Rascacoon.

name: Scarab Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Only used for Decoration. Can be seen in Omrucs pharaoh room in Ankrahmun.

name: Scarf

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Scarfs don't have any special effects. They increase body armor with 1 armor point. A player who can't afford a Platinum Amulet could wear a scarf. This item can be bought in Edron by premium players and sold for much higher prices to a Free Account (who is unable to travel to Edron to buy his own). It is also possible to get them at the daily spawn inside a corpse that you can reach by entering the Desert Dungeon and going all the way down and then in the room with the Spiders all the way up.

name: Shockwave Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Shrunken Head Necklace

attributes.Classification: Body EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It provides the highest Speed bonus of all Amulets and Necklaces, but is mostly sought after to be used as a decoration due to its rarity.

name: Silver Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces earth damage by exactly 10%, rounded up to the nearest whole number. The earth damage animation is replaced by a spark animation if the damage is reduced to 0.
Item obtained in Edron Goblin Quest, Thais Silver Amulet Quest.
Item used in The Scatterbrained Sorcerer Quest.
This item can be found in a crate inside a cave to the east of Thais.

name: Silver Medal

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesContest Prizes

notes:
Notes
Probably a future contest prize.
You can only read the text if you stand at two squares from it or closer.

name: Silver Necklace

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
A very rare decoration that used to spawn in the bonelord cave below Wyda's Hut.
It can be seen in the Bank in Venore, and also in the Draconian treasure room and Emperor Kruzak's Treasure Room in Kazordoon.

name: Sleep Shawl

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

name: Star Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Only used as decoration.

Can be obtained from the Mad Mage Room Quest.

name: Stone Skin Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces physical and death damage by exactly 80% rounded up to the nearest whole number. This amulet only reduced physical damage up until Update 8.4. The spell conceived to the stone skin was not learned by any mage, using the stoneskin used to paralyze people, turning them into stones. So the scholars of Ankrahmun decided to embed that spell in an amulet, instead.
Reward from The Queen of the Banshees Quest, Draconia Quest and Mad Mage Room Quest.

name: Strange Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and NecklacesQuest Items

notes:
Notes
There's a mysterious message on it.Looks the same as an Ancient Amulet.
Obtained and used in the Dawnport Quest.

name: Strange Talisman

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
Reduces Energy Damage by exactly 10%, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

name: Suspicious Device

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It can be obtained by using a Surprise Jar.
Part of the Dangerous Depths Quest.

name: Terra Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
It gives 20% protection from Earth Damage but increases damage taken from Fire by 10%. Part of the Terra Set.

Item obtained in the Against the Spider Cult Quest.

name: The Cobra Amulet

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
By using this item on an Intricate Cobra Shrine here, you can get A Note About Two Souls which is related to Scarlett Etzel and Galthen. Using the amulet on Intricate Cobra Shrine will break the curse on Scarlett Etzel and Galthen, returning the bastion to its former glory. Warning: You will lose the Cobra Amulet in the process.
CipSoft has confirmed that when a specific number of players use their amulets, there will be a slight "cosmetic" change. However, the details of this cosmetic change are yet to be discovered.

name: The Eye of Suon

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: The Lion's Heart

attributes.Classification: Tools and other EquipmentTaming ItemsAmulets and Necklaces

notes:
Notes
This item is used to tame a Noble Lion.  It cannot break. You will receive this item as a reward of the Lion's Rock Quest.
Failed:The noble lion fled.
Failed: The noble lion majestically rejects your amulet.
Succeeded: The noble lion will now accompany you as a friend and ally.
